post:
[PrimaHost](https://www.primahost.info/) provides limited offers of SSD KVM plans in France. Our VPS’s support a wide range of Operating Systems such as Ubuntu, Debian, CentOS and Windows Server.
We accept payments via PayPal, credit/debit cards (via Stipe), Webmoney and Bitcoin (via Webmoney USD).  

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**WIN-3GB-FR-SP**  
• CPU: **4 vCore**  
• RAM: **3072MB**  
• Hard Drive: **35GB SSD**  
• IP addresses: 1 IPv4, 2 IPv6  
• Port Speed: 1Gbit  
• Bandwidth: **Unlimited**  
• OS: **Windows**  
• Features: Anti-DDoS  
• Control Panel: SolusVM  
• **5,95 €/mo. | $7/mo.**  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[Order Link](https://www.primahost.info/cart.php?a=add&pid=82)  

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**LIN-3GB-FR-SP**  
• CPU: **4 vCore**  
• RAM: **3072MB**  
• Hard Drive: **35GB SSD**  
• Swap: 1024MB  
• IP addresses: 1 IPv4, 2 IPv6  
• Port Speed: 1Gbit  
• Bandwidth: **Unlimited**  
• OS: **Linux**  
• Features: Anti-DDoS  
• Control Panel: SolusVM  
• **5,95 €/mo. | $7/mo.**  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[Order Link](https://www.primahost.info/cart.php?a=add&pid=84)
